title: Messages Beta for Mac OS X
description:
Messages Beta for Mac OS X

With Messages Beta you get iMessage and Face Time on your Mac for free.

Description:

Download Messages Beta and get a taste of whatÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s coming in OS X Mountain Lion. When you install Messages, it replaces iChat. But iChat services will continue to work. And Messages brings iMessage to the Mac ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ just like on iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch running iOS 5. Here are the features you can expect with Messages:

Send unlimited iMessages to any Mac, iPad, iPhone, or iPod touch.*
Start an iMessage conversation on your Mac and continue it on your iPad, iPhone, or iPod touch.
Send photos, videos, attachments, contacts, locations, and more.
Launch a FaceTime video call and bring the conversation face-to-face.
Messages supports iMessage, AIM, Yahoo!, Google Talk, and Jabber accounts.
